Description:
Aurora Melbourne Central - A New Dawn, A New Dimension
Please contact agent for private inspection!
Brand New High ROI returns
Stamp duty savings
Final Stage 3 - settling soon.
2Beds 2Baths + 1Car +1 storage cage
Overlooking Bay-view and Botanic Garden
Basement retail shops + trains lines connections
Tiffany Yan 0435 778 656 Sales Consultant of Azeta Property Management for more information on this great investment. Book an inspection now to view the facilities of this Landmark Aurora Melbourne Central!!!
Aurora Melbourne Central is the only residential development in Melbourne with a direct underground connection to the Melbourne Central Train Station and the city's largest continuous retail precinct. In the heart of the CBD, this alluring 86 -storey tower features luxury 1,2 and 3 bedroom residences with breathtaking views over some of the citys most treasured landmarks. Enjoy unprecedented convenience and connectivity to everything, including world-leading universities like the University of Melbourne and RMIT, cultural attractions, superb shopping, entertainment and dining only an elevator ride away.
A self-contained community, catering to your every need, including Private Cinema, Karaoke Room, Gymnasium, Themed Dining and Lounge Rooms, Sauna, Steam, 25m Indoor Lap Pool, Reading Lounge, Plunge Pool / Outdoor Jacuzzi, Outdoor Dining and BBQ area, Sundeck, Yoga Zone, Dance Barre, High Tea Room, and more.
Aurora offers:
- Elegant and luxurious finishes between the lighter Dawn scheme or darker Twilight scheme
- European kitchen appliances, kitchen joinery as well as sanitary wares and fittings
- Access to natural lighting for all bedrooms
- Floor to ceiling glass with stunning views across the city to the bay, parklands, Dandenong Ranges and beyond for some units
- Beautifully designed facilities for Stratus Club, Cumulus Club, Australis Club
Dont miss the rare opportunity once in a lifetime chance to live amongst the clouds and experience a new paradigm in urban living! CALL NOW!
*AZeta Team States*
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority.
In accordance with State Government guidelines, open for inspections are currently not permitted.
During this time, we encourage you to contact the listing agent with your details to register your interest.
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Description:
North Facing Bliss
The Feel:
A special opportunity awaits you to build your dream home on an incredible vacant allotment in this highly sought-after 13th Beach Estate locale. This privileged position will offer north facing views. With direct access to a pathway that leads to the exclusive Clubhouse & beach access beyond, this 957sqm (approx.) site will appeal to those looking for a never-to-be-replicated lifestyle prospect or desirable investment.
The Facts:
-Vacant allotment with ideal north orientation
-Dream big! Generous allotment of vacant land to build your dream home (STCA)
-The land is cleared & ready for development
-Well-protected north facing block invites year-round alfresco living
-Short 5-minute walk to Clubhouse & 5min bike ride to beach access track
-Sought-after prime location offering a relaxed lifestyle close to 13th Beach Golf Club
-Gated community offers privacy & integrity in peaceful, stunning natural surrounds.
-Shops, amenities & stunning, untouched beaches all within short drive
-Gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village & your choice of beaches
-90mins to Melbourne CBD via freeway, & an easy 20min drive to Geelong
-A special project or lucrative investment; investors & serious buyers, be quick!
The owner loves.
This will be the place that your dream house is built. This area provides a sense of space that will be the base for your coastal sanctuary.

Description:
Simplicity, Functionality & Luxury Design
The Feel:
Carefully planned to integrate with its surroundings, this builders own home epitomises true craftsmanship & lifestyle-driven design. Built to the highest quality, you will never outgrow this home. Two master suites offer resort-style luxury with high-end finishes, while three more bedrooms have built-in desks & BIRs. From the Silvertop Ash timber cladding & high entrance door, to soaring tilt panel concrete walls, this property showcases a natural palette of materials, enveloping a sheltered, private enclave with mineral pool for the best in outdoor living.
The Facts:
-Custom builders own home by Basebuild Constructions with Lachlan Shepherd Architects
-Clever family friendly floorplan equates to a house youll never outgrow
-4m high ceilings & tilt panel concrete walls are artworks unto themselves
-Premium Colorbond Monument Nailstrip cladding extends to internal walls & entrance ceiling
-Silvertop Ash timber cladding & high entrance door embody the simplicity & functionality within
-Walkway glazing reveals the private central enclave with pool - the focal point of the home
-Expansive commercial grade tinted double-glazed windows offer seamless connection to outdoors
-Highland Oak engineered flooring + pure wool carpet in all bedrooms & 2nd living
-Zoned hydronic heating & ceiling fans throughout + gas log fire & split system RC in main hub
-Giant sliding stacker doors open up to invite cross-flow ventilation
-Kitchen boasts Statuario porcelain benchtops & splashbacks, echoed in all wet areas
-Timber veneer cabinetry with soft close drawers & automatic overhead touch cupboards
-Top of the range appliances; 2 x 600mm ovens, induction cook-top, overflow DishDrawer
-Fully-fitted hideaway Butlers Pantry with integrated dishwasher & bins & enviable storage
-High electronic windows welcome additional daylight & ventilation into the home
-Huge 2nd living/rumpus room features custom in-built AV storage unit
-7m x 3.3m mineral pool with solar heating, glass balustrades & concealed equipment area
-Covered alfresco with Blackbutt decking, outdoor kitchen plumbed to gas, electrical & TV points
-Master sanctuary epitomises luxury with BIRs & connection private, central enclave & pool
-En-suite features matte honed-finish porcelain vanity & in situ shower (rain & handheld showers)
-Commodious Guest/2nd Master BR with WIR, bespoke joinery & en-suite
-3 additional spacious bedrooms with built-in desks & BIRs
-Stunning central bathroom with freestanding oval bath, large shower, porcelain vanity and separate WC
-North-facing Study with custom Blackbutt desk & fully fitted joinery
-Triple garage with flush-mounted Silvertop Ash doors, ply wood lining & built-in storage
-5,000L rainwater tank with electric pump servicing external tap points & irrigation system
-Short 8 min walk to Clubhouse & 5 min bike ride to beach access track
The Owner Loves....
The indoor/outdoor mentality is realised here, with giant stacker sliders opening up the sides of the house the space works so well for entertaining. Our choice of natural materials contrasts beautifully with the natural green backdrop & creates a very calming environment.

Description:
Opportunity Knocks in Prestigious 13th Beach Estate
The Feel:
Located in the renowned 13th Beach Golf Links Resort, this generous 956.8m2 (approx) allotment could be the site of your dream home. Positioned in one of the best & most tightly held streets in the Estate, there are very few remaining vacant blocks here. Backing onto the 1st & 2nd holes of the Creek Course, you will be afforded beautiful views, with the virtues of designing a home that capitalises on stunning natural aspects. This gated community offers privacy & integrity in peaceful surrounds.
The Facts:
-Vacant allotment with stunning outlook & guaranteed views
-Generous 956sqm (approx) allotment to build your dream home (STCA)
-Substantial 20m2 frontage, with 27m2 rear boundary allows for very adaptable plans
-Land is cleared & ready for development
-Flanked by existing single-storey dwellings
-Short stroll to Clubhouse & quick bike ride to beach access track
-Sought-after prime location offering a relaxed lifestyle close to 13th Beach Golf Club
-Gated community offers privacy & integrity in peaceful, stunning natural surrounds
-Shops, amenities & pristine untouched beaches all within short drive
-Gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village & your choice of beaches
-90mins to Melbourne CBD via freeway, & an easy 20min drive to Geelong
-A special project or lucrative investment; investors & serious buyers, be quick!
The Owner Loves
It is a huge advantage to secure one of the last remaining blocks in one of the best streets. It is a warm and inviting neighbourhood, and has the village feel of Barwon Heads.

Description:
Esteemed Coastal Lifestyle Opportunity Super-sized Land In Premier Location Premium Land At 13th Beach
Located in the premium residential precinct of 13th Beach Golf Links, this vast allotment - currently the largest on the market - is the ultimate setting for your dream home. The blocks east-west orientation allows for a north-facing build, with panoramic views across verdant practice greens, manicured native landscapes and the striking Cypress tree shelterbelts beyond. Home of the Vic Open, the prestigious gated community of 13th Beach offers an unparalleled coastal lifestyle. If its space, privacy and tranquility youre seeking, this ones for you.
Architectural, landscape and building guidelines are in place to protect your space and views and to maintain the estates integrity. With direct access to walking paths, its a mere 5 minutes to the modern clubhouse to indulge in happy hour or a delicious restaurant meal with friends. A 5-minute bike ride takes you to the 13th Beach access track and one of the most spectacular stretches of coastline in Victoria.
Only a few minutes away, the popular seaside township of Barwon Heads is bustling with boutique shops, cafes and restaurants, and offers the natural beauty of the Barwon River and The Bluff. The Bellarine Peninsulas wineries, fine dining establishments and natural wonders are all just a short drive away. Its 20 minutes to Geelongs CBD; 90 minutes to Melbourne. Cleared and ready to develop, this parcel of land offers convenience, as well as an esteemed coastal lifestyle. Land size 1396sqm (approx.).

Description:
Angaston
The Feel:
Tucked away in a peaceful bushland setting, Angaston presents a rare lifestyle opportunity on 9 stunning acres in tightly held Connewarre, a desirable surprise pocket of country living on the coast! Ideally placed for family convenience just a few short minutes by car to Warralily shops and Breamlea surf beach, this property is heaven on earth for those looking for peace and room to grow.
The Facts:
-Classic 3BR+study homestead on 9 picturesque acres
-Long country driveway marked by lemon scented gums
-Slate flooring, SSAC and Coonara to bright lounge
-Big country kitchen with great storage and breakfast bar
-Two wall ovens, electric cooking and double fridge cavity
-Spacious formal dining and sitting room with open fire
-Bay window with seating, ensuite and WIR to master suite
-Separate minor BR wing, family bathroom and laundry
-High ceilings, solid timber windows and doors and great storage
-Double carport with additional double garage or workshop
-Established orchard bearing apples, quince, peach, pear and more!
-Mix of Casuarinas, native Gum, Olive and Peppercorn trees
-20,000L of rainwater storage with pump for gardens, 1.5kW solar array
-North facing vegie gardens and chook run for a self-sufficient lifestyle
-2 fully fenced paddocks with access to town water, one with dam
-A few short minutes by car to Warralily shops, or Breamlea surf beach
-15mins to Geelong and Torquay and 6mins to cafes in Barwon Heads
The Owner Loves.
We love the convenience that this location offers, its only 3mins to Warralily shopping centre and not much further to Torquay or Barwon Heads. Its so peaceful with stunning birdlife, and the land has been ideal for horse and sheep agistment.

Description:
Golfside Living in 13th Beach Estate
The Feel:
Designed for easy, enviable coastal living in the renowned 13th Beach Golf Links Estate, this stylish 3BR, open plan living home offers generous outdoor space, with north and south covered alfresco areas. Backing onto the 18th hole of the Creek Course, this peaceful retreat offers privacy & a quality lifestyle for the professional couple, small family or summer holidays in stunning natural surrounds.
The Facts:
-OP living, kitchen and meals area with SE golf course outlook & garden aspects
-Stone benchtops & waterfall island, Blanco oven & gas cooktop
-Sunny North & South paved alfresco areas with RC electric louvres
-High ceilings, floating timber floors, plus ambient gas log fire & SSAC acclimates the home
-Master BR with en suite and full length BIR
-2 additional BRs (1 adjoins the bathroom, with north garden access)
-Central bathroom with freestanding bath, in situ shower, separate toilet & European laundry
-Low maintenance neat gardens and lawn
-Detached DLUG with rear courtyard access
-Located in the renowned 13th Beach Golf Links Estate
-Secure investment property or holiday retreat - easy lock up and go!
-Gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village & your choice of beaches
The Owner Loves.
We love the high ceilings and layout of this house; all of the living captures the south-east outlook over the golf course, with a beautiful north outlook to our private garden enclave.

Description:
North-facing block ready to build
Phone enquiry code for this property: 2982
Vacant allotment of 968m2 with a 22 metre frontage, 44 metre depth and a north-facing backyard with uninterrupted views over the practice greens. Cleared and ready for development.
FEATURES OF THE ALLOTMENT:
Huge 968m2 north-facing block
Build your dream home without delay; land is cleared and ready for development (STCA)
Design and building guidelines ensure aesthetically pleasing streetscape to safeguard your space, views and investment
Uninterrupted views from backyard across beautifully manicured practice green
5 minute walk to clubhouse with restaurant facilities
5 minutes to private access pathway to Thirteenth Beach and Life Saving Club
NBN ready
FEATURES OF 13TH BEACH GOLF LINKS RESORT:
Located in the highly coveted 13th Beach Golf Links Resort, a stunning natural environment that is beautifully landscaped and maintained, conveniently positioned and much loved by its residents.
Gated community offers peace, tranquility, privacy and security
13th Beach Golf Links is home to the Vic Open Golf Tournament
FEATURES OF THE REGION:
Barwon Heads/Connewarre is ideally positioned as the gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula
5 minutes to boutique shopping, cafes and restaurants in Barwon Heads village
5 minutes to Barwon River for boating, fishing and aquatic activities
5 minutes to pristine ocean and river beaches
10 minutes to all major supermarkets
10 minutes to Bellarine Rail Trail for walking and cycling
10 minutes to equestrian facilities in Wallington
10 minutes to Marshall train station for an easy commute to Melbourne
20 minutes to Geelong
30 minutes to Queenscliff for Searoad Ferry
90 minutes to Melbourne CBD

Description:
Lakeside Luxury at Kanandah 13.41ha 33.14 acres approx.
Superbly positioned with expansive lake views, Kanandah offers a rare opportunity to secure a rural lifestyle retreat stretching over a meticulously presented 33.14 acres (approx).
Absorbing the rich scenery, with sweeping lake views to Geelong & beyond, this property offers the perfect balance of coastal living within easy-commuting distance to Geelong. Located only a short drive to nearby Barwon Heads, Ocean Grove & Torquay, the property is perfectly positioned to access everything that the Surf Coast & Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
The homestead sits in an elevated position and offers 5 spacious bedrooms and 2 luxurious bathrooms, the master retreat supported by a stylish ensuite, WIR storage plus private direct access to the adjoining spa on the deck. The stunning open plan living & dining spaces take advantage of the striking views over Lake Connewarre, a modern kitchen with great natural light and updated stainless steel appliances (incl. oven + steam oven, dishwasher, induction stovetop).
The property also offers a private second entrance to an ever-convenient mud room (incl. powder room) and is further supported by a spacious separate laundry with ample storage space.
The property presents as an entertainer's paradise with panoramic northerly views over the paddocks and lake towards Geelong and the You Yangs, with westerly views towards the green rolling hills of the Surf Coast. The property offers multiple al-fresco living/dining spaces with an extensive verandah providing access to the spa, stylish built-in pizza oven and separate pergola area with fire pit perfect for late-afternoon drinks.
Hobby farmers will be well resourced with abundant shedding and storage including a huge triple auto garage next to the home which includes a mezzanine floor for extra storage, plus an expansive open-bay machinery shed, workshop, toolshop, man cave space, separate toilet & shipping container.
The property is divided into 3 main paddocks with 1 being farmed under "regenerative agricultural practices", direct private access to Lake Connewarre, x1 dam, electric fence unit, cattle yards & crush plus troughs connected to town water supply. For the green thumbs the property also features a large enclosed chook run, veggie garden and orchard.
Further key additions to the property include wood heater with heat transfer throughout the residence, hardwood timber floors, 'Nue Stone' benchtops, double glazed windows, 5KW solar electricity, external all-weather blinds, outdoor shower, town water supply plus a further 100,000L tank water (approx).
All of this is conveniently located within a 20 minute drive to Geelong and for those looking for a weekender only 1hr 20 minutes approx to Melbourne. A short stroll to the end of the road takes you to the Taits Point lookout and boat ramp for stunning sunset views over Lake Connewarre, perfect for a picnic or for a spot of bird watching. A short drive to The Village Warralily makes shopping a breeze, while the superb location also provides easy access to local hotspots including Barwon Heads, Ocean Grove & Torquay, Queenscliff ferry terminal, championship golf courses, surf beaches and prestigious wineries.
This lifestyle opportunity is perfectly suited to horses & mixed-farming, offering a rare opportunity to secure a prestigious lakeside holding in the tightly-held Connewarre community.
Insights: 40 Staceys Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
The Bank House
The Feel:
Merging harmoniously into its natural landscape within the 13th Beach estate, creating an intrigue and excitement synonymous with award winning architecture, this Auhaus designed 4 bedroom home offers unsurpassable quality and creativity across a carefully oriented layout, consolidating garden vistas while drawing on warming northern light.
The Facts:
-Organic Silvertop Ash cladding contrasts with off-form concrete walls, enveloped by a dune-like embankment to the rear
-3 metre ceilings complement full height double glazing, wrapping around the north facing courtyard with pool
-Concrete floors throughout enjoy the luxury of thermostaically controlled hydronic slab heating underfoot
-Handcrafted Messmate joinery by eco-responsible company Bombora Custom Furniture is heavily featured
-First class finishes are experienced within the kitchen, featuring New York Marble and V-Zug appliances
-Integrated Liebherr fridge/freezer and well fitted walk in butlers pantry with instantaneous hot water
-Auhaus Humble and Radius handles in solid Brass contrast stylishly against traceless black cabinetry
-A longline courtyard with visual links to White Cedar trees, separates the home into living and sleeping zones
-The children's wing shares a luxurious main bathroom, study area with bespoke joinery and engaging outlooks
-Guests will relish in the spacious hotelesque quarters on offer, complete with wall to wall robes and ensuite bathroom
-Naturalistic vistas across the lush Creek Course are enjoyed from the undercover alfresco with Ironbark decking
-Heightened opulence is felt within the Master bedroom, ensuite bathroom and thoughtfully designed walk in robe
-Additional features include a commodious home office offering versatility as a gymnasium or extra living area
-Further workspace within the remote controlled triple garage will prove handy for tradespeople and tinkerers
-Individually tailored luminaires by Giffin Design Melbourne have been thoughtfully installed throughout
-Technology is at the forefront, demonstrated via the self cleaning pool with automated touch screen control

Description:
Architectural Stunner in Prestigious 13th Beach Estate
The Feel:
Located in the renowned 13th Beach Golf Links Resort, this 4-bedroom, dual living, architect designed home on a generous 1170sqm (approx.) allotment is positioned in one of the best streets in the Estate and backs onto the 18th Hole of the creek Course. The open plan kitchen and meals areas affords beautiful views of the stunning gardens and beyond. This gated community offers privacy and security in a beautiful links environment.
The Facts:
-Exceptional family home, 2 minutes stroll to the club house
-Breathtaking entry leads to garden views & visual connection to golf course
-French Oak engineered timber floors complemented by Italian porcelain tiles
-Spacious OP living, kitchen and dining zone under soaring 4.5m raked ceiling
-Family minded floorplan cleverly designed to maximise space while providing 2 living zones
-Indoor/outdoor lifestyle, with sliding doors opening onto alfresco & lawn areas
-Modern kitchen w/ caesarstone island bench & fully fitted butlers pantry
-High quality Ilve appliances (900mm oven, 6 burner cooktop, DW)
-Entertainers dream home, with room for family & friends indoors and out
-Impressive Spotted Gum cladding combined with modern metal cladding on the exterior
-Master Suite boasts ensuite with stone bench, large shower & separate toilet, plus WIR
-3 further bedrooms with BIRs one of which serves as a dedicated study with desk joinery
-Additional living room with ample storage
-Outdoor areas with landscaped native gardens, decorative stone topping & slate pavers
-Productive fruit trees include citrus, espaliered apples, apricots & veggies in raised beds
-2 x zoned Brivis ducted heating & cooling systems and a gas log fire in the living room
-Tech includes: video intercom, Sonos sound system, data cable wired, NBN, Cable TV
-Oversized DLUG with extra parking for golf cart and sundry equipment
-2,000ltr rainwater tank, automated sprinkler system, double glazed windows, 6 star rating
The Owner Loves
"We love the feeling of light & space with garden views and the amazing bird life.

Description:
Privacy, Style and Luxury in 13th Beach Estate
Expressions of Interest | Offers closing Friday 24th April at 4.00pm
This custom built Dennehy home optimises indoor-outdoor living and the stunning parkland environs whilst respecting privacy and style. Set in the prestigious community of 13th Beach Golf Links, the ambience is peaceful, affluent and desirable.
The design showcases Spotted Gum flooring and the efficiency of double glazing. The floorplan partially wraps a very large entertaining patio accessible from the central living hub, study and lounge. This extensive outdoor space catches the north-easterly sun yet escapes the prevailing south-westerly weather.
The wonderfully spacious kitchen/living hub features a raked ceiling, bright clerestory windows and a bright wall of north-east facing glass. The built-in gas log fire, audiovisual joinery and split system AC are luxurious additions.
Caesarstone is featured lavishly in the kitchen. The 900mm electric oven, matching gas cooktop and Miele dishwasher will appeal to cooks and chefs alike.
The rear-placed lounge is graced with a magnificent vista over the 2nd fairway of The Creek course. Two inviting bedrooms, a stylish family bathroom and the laundry bud off this calm space. The adjoining deck is a beautiful spot to catch the coastal breezes in summer.
The rejuvenating master suite connects with a private leafy courtyard. The walk-in robe, split system AC and large ensuite set the comfort level high.
The study could be repurposed into a 4th bedroom. Double lock up garage with built-in cabinetry.
The serenading surf reminds of the close proximity to the ocean and private beach access. Inspect this superb home. Investigate the benefits of this superb links lifestyle.
Insights: 45 Plantation Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2017 and 4 other 3 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Country Living Close to the Beach and Towns
Due to the current Global Health Pandemic, we will not be doing Open for inspections at any of our current listings until further notice, however arrangements can still be made for a private inspection by contacting the listing agent.
This prime 45 ha 110 acres approx. is part of the original Charlemont Estate and provides a huge blank canvas to build your ideal home. Perfectly located between the charming beachside towns of Barwon Heads and Torquay. Create the quiet rural lifestyle youve always dreamed about, with the convenience of being close to amenities and some of the regions best coastline.
The land on offer is gently sloping and well drained and is surrounded by an abundance of open space for the kids to explore. The potential is endless.
A sealed road provides access to the property and town water and power are available. With distant neighbours and next to no passing traffic, privacy and tranquillity are guaranteed.
On the farming front, this parcel of land provides an opportunity to graze cattle, sheep, alpaca and horses, including agistment, or all of the above. Alternatively, the land could be used for cropping including making hay to feed the animals.
Explore the many attractions the surrounding Bellarine Peninsula and Surf Coast regions have to offer. Geelongs city centre can be reached in 20 minutes, with Melbournes CBD just over an hour away.
Search no further for the ideal rural lifestyle property close to the beach. If youd like the best of both worlds, arrange an inspection today!

Description:
Lock Up And Leave!
The Feel:
Conveniently situated in the covetable 13th Beach Estate, this 2BR apartment presents as the perfect weekender or downsize for those looking to retire in style. Placement near to the Clubhouse and all course facilities will be enjoyed, along with direct access through to the pristine sands of 13th Beach. The perfect set up - ready to be occupied.
The Facts:
-OP living, dining and kitchen with extensive glazing
-Sensational outlooks across the 13th Beach course
-Kitchen has 600mm quality apps and great storage
-Heightened skillion ceilings amplify interior space
-The spacious living area enjoys direct balcony access
-An ideal spot to watch the sunset, drink in hand
-2 large BRs with BIRs, one with a private balcony
-Shared bathroom with rain head shower and W.C
-Concealed laundry and plentiful storage options
-Ducted heating & cooling for the cooler months of the year
-SLUG, secure entry and 5 mins from Barwon Heads
-Public transport options close by for commuters
-Enjoy the peace and security within this popular estate
The Owner Loves:
Weve loved utilising this apartment as our weekender, it really is set up perfectly to lock up and leave. Watching the sunset over the course of an evening is a highlight, along with the short walk to 13th Beach.

The Charms Of Country Living

- Easy access to Warralily Primary School and Armstrong Creek School
- Open plan living zone and family room open to the alfresco

- Kitchen boasts a b/in pantry, cooking apps, SMEG dishwasher
- Master bed features a w/in robe and en suite with spa bath
- 4 additional large bedrooms (3 with b/in robes, 1 with w/in robe)
- Ducted heating and two split-system air conditioners
- Alfresco flows onto the secure yard for outdoor living
- Remote double lock-up garage and ample rainwater storage
- 3-bay machinery shed, plus shed containing 3 horse stables

Description:
Class & Lifestyle in Connewarre Paradise
Properties of this class do not come along every day. 2.5 acres approx. of residence nestled in the peaceful and charming estate of Connewarre. Comprising 5 massive bedrooms all with built-in robes and master with elegant ensuite. Gourmet kitchen, huge gas stove, ample bench, cupboard, and pantry space which overlooks stunning living and dining area. Luxurious lounge complete with wood fire and formal dining area. Huge rumpus room complete with pool table area and bar. Stylish 2nd bathroom, spacious laundry, 3rd shower and toilet. The outdoor living this property provides is totally special. Elaborate timber decking surrounds the home and full veranda keeps the property cool all year round. Massive entertaining area ideal for alfresco dining, BBQ, under cover spa complete with timber decking and pizza oven which provides space for the whole family. Features 10 French double doors, solar hot water, quality fittings and amazing natural light. Five Car garage, garden shed and low maintenance gardens. Just minutes to beaches and easy access to Geelong and ring road.
The Feel
Quality, class, charm & space combine in this 2.5 acre approx. residence, with exciting features including an all-weather spa house, gourmet kitchen, huge shedding, extensive entertaining areas & fully landscaped gardens. Comprising 5 large bedrooms (all with BIRs), & master with ensuite & dedicated dressing room, this house provides space for the whole family to come together or seek privacy. Merbau timber decking surrounds the entire home, with a full veranda for year-round practicality & alfresco dining.
The Facts
-Sophisticated 5BR home + dressing room/study on 2.5 acres approx. picturesque acres
-Circular rose garden driveway, with extensive plantings of olives & date palms
-Semi-rural lifestyle opportunity in tightly held Connewarre, only 3km to Bancoora beach
-Recently renovated kitchen with elegant custom cabinetry & huge Tassie oak benchtops
-Smeg 900mm electric oven, 5 burner gas cooktop, Miele dishwasher & Qasair industrial range
-Relaxed living & meals area under 12-foot ceilings amplifies the sense of space
-North-facing living & entertaining zones to maximise the sunny aspects & relaxed way of life
-Huge family loungeroom with combustion woodfire & custom display shelves
-Versatile entertainment room/3rd living space with Tassie Oak bar opens onto north deck
-Master wing with stunning bedroom, fully fitted dressing room w/ chandelier, & ensuite
-4 more carpeted bedrooms all have BIRs with garden views (one has built-in King Single bunks)
-Timber deck Spa House with 6-str spa, all-weather blinds, TV point & Sonos sound system
-Family bathroom with inset Tassie Oak bath, shower, timber top vanity & separate toilet
-Flooring consists of sanded yellow tongue to kitchen/dining/meals & plush carpets throughout
-Seasonal comfort with ducted electric zoned heating/cooling, woodfire, SSAC & ceiling fans
-10 x French doors open onto verandahs & outlooks to vast lawns & drought-tolerant native trees
-Laundry/3rd bathroom with shower & toilet
-5 car garage with workshop & a caravan and boat storage
-Septic Treatment Plant, 20,000ltr rainwater tanks, irrigation system + plus mains water connection
-Chook run/dog pen, wood shed + rabbit proof fencing to entire boundary
-Remote access security system plus electric security gate
-Walk to exceptional recreational reserve, or short drive to Breamlea beach & Warralily shops
-Bus stop at the corner for school buses & public transport
-15mins to Geelong, 10mins to Torquay, 8mins to cafes in Barwon Heads
The Owner Loves.
We absolutely love the quietness and the country feel of this home. Its so close to the Reserve and Bancoora Beach, yet only minutes in either direction to Geelong or Barwon Heads.

Description:
Dream Block Ready for Your Dream Home in the Prestigious 13th Beach Estate
Located in the famous 13th Beach Golf Links Resort home to the Vic Open, this gated community offers privacy and integrity in peaceful and stunning natural surrounds. Build your new home nestled amongst high quality existing homes in the estates most sought after location. Backing onto the first tee of the Beach course the generous 705m2 (approx) is the perfect parcel of land to build your dream home This location is a gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village and your choice of pristine turquoise beaches. Take advantage of the lifestyle this location and community has to offer; enjoy weekend trips to local wineries, gorge yourself on sumptuous local cuisine, or bike down the Bellarine Rail Trail. With Geelong and Melbourne within easy driving distance you can really have it all! Make the change and never look back. This block also comes with two golf share memberships.
